title: Spacious 1x1 with a pool to enjoy in this beautiful weather!
posting_body: ['1 \xa0bedroom 1 bath 885Sq.', 'Ft.', 'From $4,382/mo', '* Unit 1316 - Available 08/09/22', 'Floor Plan Specials', '2 Weeks Free on Select Apartments', 'Madera', 'CALL US TODAY:', 'show contact info', 'x266', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Apartment living at its finest!', 'This one bedroom, one bathroom HOME will impress everyone who walks through your door!', "Make this HOME yours before it's too late!", 'Stop by Madera for a tour TODAY!!', 'OFFICE HOURS:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* View - Courtyard', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* Availability24Hours', '* ClubHouse', '* ConferenceRoom', '* DoorAttendant', '* Elevator', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* GamingStations', '* Garage', '* Gate', '* GroupExercise', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* MultiUseRoom', '* NightPatrol', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '*', 'Other', '* PackageReceiving', '* Pool', '* Racquetball', '* RecRoom', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Spa', '* Sundeck', '* Transportation', '* TVLounge', '* WirelessInternet', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x266', 'Address:', '455 W Evelyn Ave Mountain View, CA 94041', 'Managed By: Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'DISCLAIMER:', 'Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.']
